On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Sid

 Union Street Bridge, Brooklyn

⏲ 5:56 p.m. on Wednesday, September 17

What are you doing today?

I’m coming back from work and collecting my vegetables as part of a CSA, then I’m going home and cooking them. I think I’m getting tomatoes, peppers and some greens. I’m making lentils with tomatoes and rice. Don’t want to spend too much time cooking.

What's your favorite part of the day?

Mornings, because I feel fresh.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Tomorrow is Thursday, right? Pretty similar to today. Nothing extra special. I’m a software engineer, so lots of meetings.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
